remarks: Value of projectivity from vector space H to dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mapdval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdval.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdval.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdval.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdval.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
mapdvalc.c $e |- C = { g e. F | ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` g ) ) ) = ( L ` g ) } $.
mapdvalc $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` T ) = { f e. C | ( O ` ( L ` f ) ) C_ T } ) $.
$d F f $.
$d F f g $.
$d K f $.
$d L g $.
$d O g $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
$d f ph $.
